name: Documenso 2.0.0
tagline: Enterprise-Grade Signature Infrastructure for Everyone
description: We’re excited to launch Documenso 2.0! This release brings everything you need for enterprise-grade e-signatures: full compliance, improved security, and a powerful new editor for precise field placement. Documenso 2.0 introduces multi-document envelopes and marks the final release of our API v2, with an improved upload flow, template hot-switching, folders API, and more. Join us in celebrating the best Documenso yet and the feature frenzy we’re kicking off now!

name: GPT-5.1 Instant and Thinking
tagline: Smarter, more conversational ChatGPT with new personalities
description: GPT-5.1 Instant and Thinking are trained using the same stack as OpenAI's reasoning models, so they score higher on factuality and complex problem-solving than GPT-5, while also introducing a more natural, conversational tone. We think many people will find that GPT-5.1 does a better job of bringing IQ and EQ together, but one default clearly can’t meet everyone’s needs.

name: Willow on IOS
tagline: Write 5x faster with voice dictation now Available on iOS
description: Willow for iOS is a full custom keyboard that lets you dictate anywhere on your iPhone. Instant speech-to-text with auto-format, full letter keyboard access, auto-correct, custom dictionary, AI rewrite, and context-aware style-matching. Willow is 3× more accurate and faster than Apple's built-in dictation. Willow is now cross-platform between Mac and iOS. You can redeem our limited-time Product Hunt discount code in the Mac app and use the same account on iOS.

name: Avaturn Live
tagline: AI avatars 9X faster, 4X expressive range w/, human fidelity
description: Human-like AI avatars you can talk to instantly. Avatars that responds faster then you blink with natural speech and active listening. They smile, emote, and react like real people. Perfect for customer support, training, and interactive AI experiences that feel truly alive.

name: Nomad Care Map
tagline: Find trusted medical care around the world
description: We’re launching Nomad Care Map, the first directory for doctors and medical provider reviews for nomads worldwide. Find the best doctors everywhere, discover what services they provide and estimated prices, powered by anonymized community data. We already have 4,000+ medical providers and 8,000+ reviews on the Nomad Care Map and growing every day!

name: Product Intelligence
tagline: Automatically turn support tickets into feature requests.
description: You know exactly what customers need but struggle to convince your Product and Engineering teams. Building that proof means hours of manual work. Product Intelligence automates the feedback cycle, so you can turn support tickets into evidence-backed feature requests.

name: Webjourney
tagline: Framer that allows you to vibe-code
description: Describe your product and get a launch-ready, credible page that looks handcrafted by expert Framer designers, ready to share with the world. It’s effortless to use and save you from design-tool hell like Figma or Framer do.

name: Easy Tasks by Morgen
tagline: Your browser's missing shortcut for getting stuff done.
description: Bookmarks have no reminders, tabs clutter your screen, and opening another to-do app just breaks your flow. Now, you can highlight any text on the web and instantly turn it into a task for later with one simple shortcut. Each task saves a link that takes you right back to the text you highlighted, so you never lose your context. PS: this feature is 100% vibe-coded with Claude Code ✌️

name: Bunny Shield
tagline: Strong CDN security without gatekeeping
description: Protect your sites and APIs with advanced WAF, DDoS mitigation, rate limiting, bot detection, and upload scanning. Configure protection in an intuitive dashboard and get real-time visibility through detailed event logs. Serious security shouldn’t be a luxury. Start free. Scale with fair, transparent pricing.

name: Doco Agent Mode
tagline: Autonomous AI agent for Microsoft Word
description: Introducing Doco Agent Mode – the biggest leap forward in Microsoft Word. We’re moving beyond helping you write documents. Doco Agent Mode is an autonomous AI teammate that now edits directly inside Word — with track changes enabled — and takes on your entire workflow, from drafting to formatting. With Doco's Agent Mode, you can assign complex, multi-step tasks, and it will work through them sequentially right in your document.

name: Devpilot
tagline: The AI co-pilot for your entire development lifecycle.
description: Devpilot is your new AI co-engineer, designed to take you from a single idea to a fully deployed, full-stack application. Stop wrestling with boilerplate, configuration files, and complex API integrations. Devpilot handles the entire workflow, acting as an autonomous agent that understands your product goals. Autonomous App Generation: Describe your app in plain English, and watch Devpilot build the React/Vite frontend and connect a real database (e.g., Supabase, Firebase) automatically.

name: BookSell
tagline: Book dropshipping for Shopify stores
description: BookSell lets anyone create an online bookstore without inventory. Access millions of titles, integrate with top distributors, and grow your business risk-free. - Up to 40% commissions on every sale (no minimum order) - Set up a fully branded online bookstore in minutes - Browse curated title lists to find your next bestseller - Real-time inventory updates and fulfillment by top distributors. - US & International shipping available (automatic tracking number sync) - 24/7 customer service

name: Marble by World Labs
tagline: A frontier multimodal world model
description: Marble is the first product from World Labs and is powered by our multimodal world model, which lets anyone create high-fidelity, persistent 3D worlds from just a single image, video, text prompt, or 3D layout.

name: Velvet
tagline: Integrated platform for making AI videos
description: Generate end-to-end AI videos for your company in 1 minute, using the world's best video gen models. Then, make them production-ready by quickly making edits with AI tools.

name: Khorus
tagline: Cursor for A2A, where Agents collaborate & build together
description: Khorus is a platform where developers can build, deploy, and tokenize applications through an agent-to-agent (A2A) infrastucture. Built on ERC-8004 and x402, it allows agents to coordinate and share reasoning, not just data. Think of it as Cursor, but powered by agents that live on-chain. Each agent has its own personality, skill set, and specialization. They can act as developers, project managers, analysts, researchers, or security experts with new roles added constantly to fit your needs.

name: Lifter
tagline: Import. Organize. Simplify.
description: Lifter is a clean macOS utility that brings order to your imports. It automatically creates Year/Month/Day folders, renames files with flexible templates, and detects duplicates with MD5 comparison. Preview every action in Simulate mode before copying. Built entirely in SwiftUI, runs offline, and respects your Mac’s sandbox.

name: Duos AI
tagline: Get Hired Faster by Playing Interview Games Against AI
description: Job interviewing is the most profitable skill you'll ever learn. With Duos, you go from zero to hero faster than with a real career coach. Practice with AI interviewers that feel real, act real and are fun to figure out. Win or lose, you get experience anyway. Track progress, boost your interview readiness and start collecting job offers instead of rejections.

name: Winus
tagline: Your Financial AI Partner — Intelligence • Precision • Trust
description: Winus is your Financial AI Partner powered by professional agents. It helps financial professionals plan smarter, research deeper, and deliver faster — with affordable global data coverage, full traceability and proven benchmark performance.

name: Turbotic Automation AI
tagline: Turn ideas into automations in minutes. Chatting, No coding
description: Anyone can Automate Anything with just a prompt. Chat with Turbotic Automation AI to create your automations. Cheaper than Zapier, easier to use than n8n. Powerful automations for any company that want to automate tasks and workflows. Try Free Version today!

name: MindX Service AI
tagline: Cursor for Customer Support
description: MindX Service AI is a human-grade, fully agentic AI that handles customer queries across chat and email. It auto-resolves 80% of tickets, boosts agent productivity by 20%, and delivers 24/7 support without hiring more staff.
